Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class PersonalBoardExt

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.constant.model.PersonalBoard
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.PersonalBoardExt
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable<Message>
public class PersonalBoardExt
extends PersonalBoard
implements Observable<Message>
PersonalBoardExt class. Extends PersonalBoard and implements Observable interface. Manage the player's personal board.

  • Method Details

    • addDevCard

      public void addDevCard​(DevelopmentCard card, int pos) throws NoSpaceException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Add a DevCard in a specific position.
      Parameters:
      card - of type DevelopmentCard: the card that has to be added.
      pos - of type int: the position in the personal board where the card has to be placed
      Throws:
      NoSpaceException - the no space exception, thrown when the personal board is full.
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if is not valid.

    • addLeaderCard

      public void addLeaderCard​(LeaderCardExt[] leaderCard)
      Add the two Leader Card chosen in the initial game.
      Parameters:
      leaderCard - of type LeaderCardExt[]: array containing the chosen leader card.

    • goodindex

      private boolean goodindex​(int index) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Check the index is an int between 0 and 2.
      Parameters:
      index - of type int: the index that has to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if the index is minor than 2 and major than 0. Including 0 and 2.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • setDiscard

      card - of type LeaderCardExt: the card that has to be removed.
